author: matt lord
comment: Worth it!

author: aaron tenner
comment: fun ! LG G5 ANDROID moto 360 works well love the corner short cuts

author: Jared C
comment: Sucks. Looks good but isn't working properly

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What is your watch device? Can you send me some details about your issue by email at thema.apps@gmail.com I'll be happy to help you

comment: Good
This watch faceplate is great! Really like all the changeable features. Works great on my old moto 360. Thanks

author: Jonny Galo
comment: Love this watch face it's easy to use and customise. And if I don't need it I take it off the whole ting was well built and is well maintained. The only problem im having is the timer widget isn't working. But I've had that problem sense Google updated the clock app in general.

author: Simon Cooper
comment: Finally managed to get it working. I've never had as much trouble installing something as this. I stumbled across the installation process by mistake. Having said all this I am very pleased now with the watch face.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Did you install the watch face on both mobile and watch?
You must install it on both device. Android wear 2.0 does not sync the application automatically as Android wear 1.5 did.

author: Paul Johnson
comment: Love it but how do i get it to read Fahrenheit instead of Celsius

author: James Walters
comment: Does everything you want it to do but really slow.  Text message indicator let's you know you have a message. So you read it from your phone. Then you have to wait 10 minutes for the indication to disappear. Plus you can reply to the message from the face Watch battery and mobile battery level takes to long to pop up. Good app just really really really slow

author: Charles Frank
comment: Great features, nice and clean and functional.  Thanks!

author: Rog Wohler
comment: great watch face, maybe add an analog option. thanks

author: Darryl Schuholz
comment: Great watch display lots of interactive area's overall great watch!

author: Mark Young
comment: Most watch faces look boring in ambient mode -- but not this one.  I absolutely love the custom app launchers for 4 apps!  I also love the compact design. Now, please do all that with color -- my watch battery can take it!
title: Very nice!

author: Luis Padilla
comment: I installed this watch face and stopped receiving push notifications.
title: No notifications

author: Jakob Busse
comment: Great design, even for round watches! Shows relevant information and lots of customization possible, plus the shortcuts are a nice touch.
title: Lovely design!

author: Jack Sanders
comment: I'm  loving it

author: Jeff Njuguna
comment: Absolutely love it!!

author: Zach Collier
comment: Very handy...

author: Danny Kirk
comment: Nice design. I only use Thema watch faces! Especially the ones with custom shortcuts like this one and Venom, Morphing etc. This is so I don't have to run another launcher app. Thema's custom shortcuts handle it fine and with very little battery drain! Thank you Thema!

author: Richard Groom
comment: Excellent support and my current favourite watch face.
title: Favourite watch face

author: Norman Petterson
comment: My Favorite

author: Harley Davidson-Jones
comment: It would be perfect if it had the "No 7" where the weather widget is when it is in the always on mode until it wakes up again. Change this for the extra star 👍😉 Edit: Dev listens and replies asap extra star well deserved 👍😁

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Done! You should be able to get the update within a few hours, depending on Google's deployment duration

title: Awesome!

author: Ken Norian
comment: Wore it at a bar and got lots lots of favorable comments.  Also nice just to wear around.  Thanks for increasing the size of the interactive areas.
title: Nice look,  good functionality.

author: Kevin McKee
comment: Im a Jack fan and this face looks great on my Moto360. Lots of available customization settings. Cheers!
title: Great watch face

author: Chris Pupka
comment: What an awesome idea, and like all of Thema's faces, well put together.

author: Daniel Hess
comment: One of the best on the market
title: Awesome

comment: GOT JACKED ALRIGHT.PAID TRIED TO DOWNLOAD.IT DIDN'T AND I NEVER GOT A REFUND.ROBBING GITS
title: Jack watch

author: Hecate Warrior
comment: Doesn't appear in android wear.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Try to sync the applications in the Android Wear settings and wait a few minutes. If not working, reboot both watch mobile and try again. It should solve your issue.
